mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ACCOUNT_CODE as accountCode, a.CURRENCY as currency, a.TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE as totalCashBalance, a.CASH_BALANCE as cashBalance, a.ACCRUED_CASH as accruedCash, a.STOCK_MARKET_VALUE as stockMarketValue, a.OPTION_MARKET_VALUE as optionMarketValue, a.FUTURE_OPTION_VALUE as futureOptionValue, a.FUTURES_PNL as futuresPnl, a.NET_LIQUIDATION_BY_CURRENCY as netLiquidationByCurrency, a.FUND_VALUE as fundValue, a.NET_DIVIDEND as netDividend, a.MUTUAL_FUND_VALUE as mutualFundValue, a.MONEY_MARKET_FUND_VALUE as moneyMarketFundValue, a.CORPORATE_BOND_VALUE as corporateBondValue, a.T_BOND_VALUE as tBondValue, a.T_BILL_VALUE as tBillValue, a.WARRANT_VALUE as warrantValue, a.FX_CASH_BALANCE as fxCashBalance, a.ACCOUNT_OR_GROUP as accountOrGroup, a.REAL_CURRENCY as realCurrency, a.ISSUER_OPTION_VALUE as issuerOptionValue, a.UNREALIZED_PNL as unrealizedPnl, a.REALIZED_PNL as realizedPnl, a.EXCHANGE_RATE as exchangeRate, a.REMARK as remark, a.CREATE_DATE as createDate, a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , CURRENCY , TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE , CASH_BALANCE , ACCRUED_CASH , STOCK_MARKET_VALUE , OPTION_MARKET_VALUE , FUTURE_OPTION_VALUE , FUTURES_PNL , NET_LIQUIDATION_BY_CURRENCY , FUND_VALUE , NET_DIVIDEND , MUTUAL_FUND_VALUE , MONEY_MARKET_FUND_VALUE , CORPORATE_BOND_VALUE , T_BOND_VALUE , T_BILL_VALUE , WARRANT_VALUE , FX_CASH_BALANCE , ACCOUNT_OR_GROUP , REAL_CURRENCY , ISSUER_OPTION_VALUE , UNREALIZED_PNL , REALIZED_PNL , EXCHANGE_RATE , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{accountCode} , #{currency} , #{totalCashBalance} , #{cashBalance} , #{accruedCash} , #{stockMarketValue} , #{optionMarketValue} , #{futureOptionValue} , #{futuresPnl} , #{netLiquidationByCurrency} , #{fundValue} , #{netDividend} , #{mutualFundValue} , #{moneyMarketFundValue} , #{corporateBondValue} , #{tBondValue} , #{tBillValue} , #{warrantValue} , #{fxCashBalance} , #{accountOrGroup} , #{realCurrency} , #{issuerOptionValue} , #{unrealizedPnl} , #{realizedPnl} , #{exchangeRate} , #{remark} , #{createDate} , #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
ACCOUNT_CODE ,
CURRENCY ,
TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE ,
CASH_BALANCE ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} ,
CURRENCY = #{currency} ,
TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE = #{totalCashBalance} ,
CASH_BALANCE = #{cashBalance} ,
ACCRUED_CASH = #{accruedCash} ,
STOCK_MARKET_VALUE = #{stockMarketValue} ,
OPTION_MARKET_VALUE = #{optionMarketValue} ,
FUTURE_OPTION_VALUE = #{futureOptionValue} ,
FUTURES_PNL = #{futuresPnl} ,
NET_LIQUIDATION_BY_CURRENCY = #{netLiquidationByCurrency} ,
FUND_VALUE = #{fundValue} ,
NET_DIVIDEND = #{netDividend} ,
MUTUAL_FUND_VALUE = #{mutualFundValue} ,
MONEY_MARKET_FUND_VALUE = #{moneyMarketFundValue} ,
CORPORATE_BOND_VALUE = #{corporateBondValue} ,
T_BOND_VALUE = #{tBondValue} ,
T_BILL_VALUE = #{tBillValue} ,
WARRANT_VALUE = #{warrantValue} ,
FX_CASH_BALANCE = #{fxCashBalance} ,
ACCOUNT_OR_GROUP = #{accountOrGroup} ,
REAL_CURRENCY = #{realCurrency} ,
ISSUER_OPTION_VALUE = #{issuerOptionValue} ,
UNREALIZED_PNL = #{unrealizedPnl} ,
REALIZED_PNL = #{realizedPnl} ,
EXCHANGE_RATE = #{exchangeRate} ,
REMARK = #{remark} ,
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} ,
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , CURRENCY , TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE , CASH_BALANCE , ACCRUED_CASH , STOCK_MARKET_VALUE , OPTION_MARKET_VALUE , FUTURE_OPTION_VALUE , FUTURES_PNL , NET_LIQUIDATION_BY_CURRENCY , FUND_VALUE , NET_DIVIDEND , MUTUAL_FUND_VALUE , MONEY_MARKET_FUND_VALUE , CORPORATE_BOND_VALUE , T_BOND_VALUE , T_BILL_VALUE , WARRANT_VALUE , FX_CASH_BALANCE , ACCOUNT_OR_GROUP , REAL_CURRENCY , ISSUER_OPTION_VALUE , UNREALIZED_PNL , REALIZED_PNL , EXCHANGE_RATE , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.accountCode} , #{item.currency} , #{item.totalCashBalance} , #{item.cashBalance} , #{item.accruedCash} , #{item.stockMarketValue} , #{item.optionMarketValue} , #{item.futureOptionValue} , #{item.futuresPnl} , #{item.netLiquidationByCurrency} , #{item.fundValue} , #{item.netDividend} , #{item.mutualFundValue} , #{item.moneyMarketFundValue} , #{item.corporateBondValue} , #{item.tBondValue} , #{item.tBillValue} , #{item.warrantValue} , #{item.fxCashBalance} , #{item.accountOrGroup} , #{item.realCurrency} , #{item.issuerOptionValue} , #{item.unrealizedPnl} , #{item.realizedPnl} , #{item.exchangeRate} , #{item.remark} , #{item.createDate} , #{item.updateDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , ACCOUNT_CODE = #{item.accountCode} , CURRENCY = #{item.currency} , TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE = #{item.totalCashBalance} , CASH_BALANCE = #{item.cashBalance} , ACCRUED_CASH = #{item.accruedCash} , STOCK_MARKET_VALUE = #{item.stockMarketValue} , OPTION_MARKET_VALUE = #{item.optionMarketValue} , FUTURE_OPTION_VALUE = #{item.futureOptionValue} , FUTURES_PNL = #{item.futuresPnl} , NET_LIQUIDATION_BY_CURRENCY = #{item.netLiquidationByCurrency} , FUND_VALUE = #{item.fundValue} , NET_DIVIDEND = #{item.netDividend} , MUTUAL_FUND_VALUE = #{item.mutualFundValue} , MONEY_MARKET_FUND_VALUE = #{item.moneyMarketFundValue} , CORPORATE_BOND_VALUE = #{item.corporateBondValue} , T_BOND_VALUE = #{item.tBondValue} , T_BILL_VALUE = #{item.tBillValue} , WARRANT_VALUE = #{item.warrantValue} , FX_CASH_BALANCE = #{item.fxCashBalance} , ACCOUNT_OR_GROUP = #{item.accountOrGroup} , REAL_CURRENCY = #{item.realCurrency} , ISSUER_OPTION_VALUE = #{item.issuerOptionValue} , UNREALIZED_PNL = #{item.unrealizedPnl} , REALIZED_PNL = #{item.realizedPnl} , EXCHANGE_RATE = #{item.exchangeRate} , REMARK = #{item.remark} , CREATE_DATE = #{item.createDate} , UPDATE_DATE = #{item.updateDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} , CURRENCY = #{currency} , TOTAL_CASH_BALANCE = #{totalCashBalance} , CASH_BALANCE = #{cashBalance} , ACCRUED_CASH = #{accruedCash} , STOCK_MARKET_VALUE = #{stockMarketValue} , OPTION_MARKET_VALUE = #{optionMarketValue} , FUTURE_OPTION_VALUE = #{futureOptionValue} , FUTURES_PNL = #{futuresPnl} , NET_LIQUIDATION_BY_CURRENCY = #{netLiquidationByCurrency} , FUND_VALUE = #{fundValue} , NET_DIVIDEND = #{netDividend} , MUTUAL_FUND_VALUE = #{mutualFundValue} , MONEY_MARKET_FUND_VALUE = #{moneyMarketFundValue} , CORPORATE_BOND_VALUE = #{corporateBondValue} , T_BOND_VALUE = #{tBondValue} , T_BILL_VALUE = #{tBillValue} , WARRANT_VALUE = #{warrantValue} , FX_CASH_BALANCE = #{fxCashBalance} , ACCOUNT_OR_GROUP = #{accountOrGroup} , REAL_CURRENCY = #{realCurrency} , ISSUER_OPTION_VALUE = #{issuerOptionValue} , UNREALIZED_PNL = #{unrealizedPnl} , REALIZED_PNL = #{realizedPnl} , EXCHANGE_RATE = #{exchangeRate} , REMARK = #{remark} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM IB_ACCOUNT_MARKET_VALUE a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT a.CURRENCY as currency , b.base_currency as baseCurrency, a.EXCHANGE_RATE as exchangeRate FROM IB_Account_Market_Value a, IB_ACCOUNT_FAMILY b WHERE a.ACCOUNT_CODE = b.IB_ACCOUNT_CODE AND a.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} AND a.CURRENCY != b.base_currency AND a.CURRENCY != 'BASE'
